dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HCON 61 IH: Establishing deadlines for the Joint Committee of Congress on the Library to approve or deny the statue of the Reverend William Franklin “Billy” Graham, Jr., for placement in the National Statuary Hall.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Budd (for himself, Mr. Murphy of North Carolina, Mr. Hudson, Mr. Bishop of North Carolina, Mr. Rouzer, and Mr. Cawthorn) submitted the following concurrent resolution; which was referred to the Committee on House Administration

form.official-title: Establishing deadlines for the Joint Committee of Congress on the Library to approve or deny the statue of the Reverend William Franklin Billy Graham, Jr., for placement in the National Statuary Hall.

section.text: That the Joint Committee of Congress on the Library shall approve or deny—

paragraph.text: the full-sized clay model and pedestal design of a statue of the Reverend William Franklin Billy Graham, Jr., not later than 30 days after the State of North Carolina submits photographs of the model from all four sides, the dimensions of the statue and pedestal, engineering drawings of the pedestal, the anticipated weight of the completed statue and pedestal, and the text of any proposed inscriptions to the Architect of the Capitol; and

the completed statue of the Reverend William Franklin Billy Graham, Jr., not later than 30 days after the State of North Carolina submits photographs of the completed statue and pedestal from all four sides, the dimensions of the statue and pedestal, the final weight of the statue and pedestal, and the text of any inscriptions to the Architect of the Capitol.
